summary: The module implements a set of helper utilities for integrating Checkov scan outputs with the Bridgecrew platform. It enriches check metadata, reduces multiple scan reports, prepares graph representations (both NetworkX and Rustworkx), and uploads various artifacts such as assets, reachability data, subgraph maps, and run metadata to the remote service.
business_intent: Enable automated collection, enrichment, and transmission of security scan results and associated graph data to Bridgecrew for centralized analysis, compliance reporting, and remediation guidance.
